articles.title: Millions of Americans’ personal data exposed in global hack - CNN
articles.description: Millions of people in Louisiana and Oregon have had their data  compromised in the sprawling cyberattack  that has also hit the US federal government, state agencies said late Thursday.

articles.title: More than 1 in 3 Americans are now living with fatty liver disease - Study Finds
articles.description: The condition primarily results from excessive consumption of unhealthy meals -- such as fast food and sugary drinks.
articles.content: CHICAGO — More than one in three U.S. adults are now living with a severe liver disorder that can lead to fatal complications, new recent reveals. This so-called “silent killer” often goes undiagnose… [+3667 chars]
